title: Enhanced bifunctional electrocatalytic activities of hybrid Co(OH)2/MOF-derived materials for green hydrogen production by electrochemical water splitting
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01632C, Paper
Apurba Borah, Sumit Nolia, Sathishkumar Palaniyappan, Rajeshkhanna Gaddam
Hybrid materials are emerging as promising because of their unique synergetic properties, resulting from the individual components and structures. Especially, for electrochemical water splitting, one of the catalytically active, affordable,...
